content.text: The first rule of functions they should be small, the second rule of functions they should be smaller than that.
A function should be between 4 and 10 lines of code.
Where do Classes go to hide?
When you have a function that can be divided into several functional areas and variables that are used by all those areas, what you have is a class.

So the way of making functions that do one thing, and one thing only is extract until you can’t extract no more. If you can extract a function from another function, then that function wasn’t doing just one thing.
